popular.title: Freelance
popular.overview: An ex-special forces operative takes a job to provide security for a journalist as she interviews a dictator, but when a military coup breaks out in the middle of the interview, they must escape into the jungle.

popular.title: Killers of the Flower Moon
popular.overview: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation.

popular.title: Trolls Band Together
popular.overview: When Branch's brother Floyd is kidnapped for his musical talents by a duo of nefarious pop-star villains, Branch and Poppy embark on a harrowing and emotional journey.

popular.title: Leo
popular.overview: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, but it brings forth consequences with connection to a dangerous world.

popular.title: Wonka
popular.overview: The story will focus specifically on a young Willy Wonka and how he met the Oompa-Loompas on one of his earliest adventures.

popular.title: Oppenheimer
popular.overview: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer's role in the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.

topRated.title: The Godfather
topRated.overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

topRated.title: The Shawshank Redemption
topRated.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

topRated.title: The Godfather Part II
topRated.overview: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son Michael expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

topRated.title: Schindler's List
topRated.overview: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution.
